class.name: smp_ros/RRTStarDubinsGlobalPlanner
class.description: Global Planner plugin using SMP motion planning library. It uses RRTStar and Dubin's car vehicle dynamics.

class.name: smp_ros/RRTStarPosQGlobalPlanner
class.description: Global Planner plugin using SMP motion planning library. It uses RRTStar and differential drive dynamics.
